name: Iki's Credits
description:
Hi! This is my first released project on Godot, it's VERY short and only has one mechanic (and a half), but it's few minutes of free entertainment.

This game uses W+S/UP+DOWN KEYS & MOUSE. It's more difficult with a trackpad.

I GENUINELY feel like those stores that immediately change to christmas stuff on November 1st, like I was complaining about that thing as I was listening to my own simple jingle bells arrangement lolol.

I didn't have enough time (ok, enough knowledge) to implement volume options, so for now you can only mute it on the menu.

Hopefully it won't break on anyone's device. I actually have only tested this on Windows so like, I really apologize if it doesn't work on anything else, I have no way of testing it haha I'm just trusting Godot on this one.

My theme, evidently: https://www.wikihow.com/Prune-a-Poinsettia

Will you cut the stems correctly, or are you making it into her cringe compilation?
